channel.title: 2 questions i have about my serv please help!
channel.description: i wanted to know how to make p rings own very bad i also wanted to make granite mauls have unlimited special.

item.title: 2 questions i have about my serv please help!
item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:10, topic:222754"][quote author=wc4evandeva link=topic=292569.msg2356255#msg2356255 date=1217322661]

how do i do that???

I didn’t know anything about coding a server when I started now I can code pretty decently and know how to fix the errors that appear while in gameplay I’m currently making a source adding tons of commands and working Ip and new stuff I just need a little help.

You are an idiot. Go learn Java.
In fact, you shouldn’t even need any Java knowledge to do that.

Lol come on we all started somewhere -.-
[/quote]

You should learn how to program before attempting to create a server, but besides - that is something you should be able to do even before you’ve started.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

sordsmen123:

i wanted to know how to make p rings own very bad i also wanted to make granite mauls have unlimited special.[/quote][quote=“sordsmen123, post:6, topic:222754”]how do i do that???

To do that you find the item in Client.java and decrease its spec usage to 0.
